title: Ready to Move in Right Away, Large 1x1 Apt~

its that friendly.", 'Heatherstone is near the Cal Train line, so hop on one and experience the nightlife and restaurants in San Francisco.', 'Heatherstone has round-the-clock leasing, call 24/7!', 'Property Amenities', '* Fitness Center', '* Courtesy Patrol', '* Flexible Lease Terms Available', '* SmokeFree', '* Clubhouse', '* High-speed internet access', '* In-Unit Washer and Dryers', '* On-Site Maintenance Team', '* On-Site Management Team', '* 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '* Package Lockers', '* Recycling', '* WIFI in Common Areas', '* Landscaped Courtyard', '* Covered Parking Available', '* Neighborhood Citrus Grove', '* Pool and Barbecue Area', '* Spa', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Parking:', 'Total Parking - Open – 97, Carport – 106', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Units:', '108', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x203', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
